note: Requires the `minecraft:barter` component and `barter_table` loot table in order to work properly.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Barter Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Enables the mob to barter for items that have been configured as barter currency. Must be used in combination with the barter component

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
